title: The Patient pedestrian
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian Road Safety Council
brief_description: Filmed in Sydney, this short safety trailer tells of the work the Road Safety Council is attempting to do to make the crossing of busy streets safe for the pedestrian. Commentary by Russ Tyson.
